tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Visited Dr Saha for my toothache. She did a root canal treatment on my tooth. I am highly  satisfied  with the treatment  will definitely recommend my family and friends.
Dr Saha was very attentive to all my questions prior and post the scaling. The process itself was smooth and painless. The staff were also extremely friendly and helpful.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
My Madam Dentist takes care of my Teeth like a Mother. 

Whether it's d Last Tooth or any part of my Mouth, she do takes care to handle her Instruments carefully  so that I not get hurt or feel stressed out during d Treatment. 

She keeps instructing me to keep d mouth half open or widely open or not to open. 

So I never feel any discomfort at any point. 

But I miss my Sir Dentist a lot.
I fully believe that it's he only who helped me to Surrender to a Female Dentist Bcoz my Madam Dentist is d 1st Female Dentist of my life nd I am Grateful to my Sir Dentist a lot for Introducing me to her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Visited Dr. Shatarupa due to wisdom teeth pain and infection , she conveyed each and every minute details regarding my condition and way forward procedures and her work is a true definition of painless surgical tooth removal both during surgery and post surgery , most importantly she was available even late nights thereby, replying and guiding through out the process which shows her dedication and commitment towards her patients , overall great experience and I don't have enough words to praise her work , but all I can say THANK YOU VERY MUCH Ms.shatarupa
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words Sir.

review:
My wife's recent visit recommended by Practo was deeply unsatisfactory. Despite hoping for a resolution to her dental issue, she encountered frustration and disappointment throughout the appointment.

The dentist failed to effectively address her concerns and referred her to an inconveniently located X-ray facility. This disregard for her time and concerns was disheartening and unacceptable.

It's clear that the clinic does not have enough equipment. ***** ********* ** ******* ******** ******* ****** ******* ****** ***** ***** ********* *** ********** ** ******* ***********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
I didn't know that my BP was so high nd my Home BP Machine  was need to repair.
So thankful to Doctor for understanding  my Helplessness nd for Canceling Appointments nd Rescheduling them again n again so Patiently n Lovingly. 
I am grateful to her Caring Approach while Extracting my Teeth at our Comfortable Time only.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I recently had done my teeth root canaled. The doctor explained my questions in a very friendly manner. Not only that, during diagnosis; she clinically has explained many things that I asked. I didn't feel any severe pain doing this root canal. The doctor carefully canalized my root at the clinic, and she tried to complete it with perfection. The price is very reasonable. The clinic is neat and clean and well sanitized.  I am recommending other patients to this doctor.
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words Sir.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I got cavities in the molars of either side of the lower mandible. so I booked an appointment for the treatment at Dentaris. I must say that Dr. Satarupa Saha is really good at her job. she finished the procedure within 20 mins. without any discrepancy. I had to visit the clinic twice for each tooth and in both cases my experience was highly satisfactory. I highly recommend.
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words Sir.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Am writing behalf of my Mother Mrs Soma Basu.
We did root canal treatment in a hospital and visited Dr for crown only.
She is very soft spoken person and explained everything before the procedure starts.
During the procedure my mother was panicked and was sick but the Doctor was so nice...she spend more time..
Moreover she understand the patient's problem and according to that she complete the procedure.
And in second sitting the crown was done.
I will recommend the Doctor .
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words madam.

review:
Visited for tooth sensitivity and RCT to Dr. S. Saha: 
She is patient-friendly, empathetic, a good listener, and professional. I feel she has done the overall procedure with utmost care with minimum/no discomfort. 

Regarding the clinics: 
Well equipped/modern, neat and clean, minimum/no wait time with prior appointment, Covid-19 protocol is strictly maintained, staffs are gentle, and I like the follow up after the procedure. 

Overall, I would definitely recommend her.
